reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Integration of the HIV-AIDS prevention, care and treatment services packet in 239 priority health zones in the Democratic Republic of Congo

description.narrative: Congo (Democratic Republic) - HIV - Stichting Cordaid - CORDAID. This program has the following goals: Ensure global care and treatment of all TB/HIV co-infected patients in DRC. Contribute to the development of the country by decreasing transmission of HIV in individuals, families and communities (contribute to the decrease of 50% in new infections and mortality) in 354 targeted Health Zones. The objectives of this program are: Reduce from 28.5% to 8% new infections in infants born to HIV positive mothers. Reduce HIV related mortality in adults from 33/100,000 in 2014 to 17/100,000 in 2017. Enrol 95% of TB/HIV co-infected patients on ART by 2017
